page.title: 14Arable farming
page.content: The main machinery that the farmers in this area use are tractors, trailers, muck spreders, ploughs, cultivator, harrows, seed drill, rollers,sprayers, fertilizers, combine harvesters, balers, forage harvesters and potato harvesters. Farms produce oats, barley, wheat and potatoes so we can eat the food that they grow. September is when farmers burn their stubble but when the wind starts blowing the wrong way the fire can start burning trees and other crops that have not been harvested. There are things that people don't like about spraying as well because some people think that spraying damages plants and flowers. When farmers burn their straw and spread manure the smell isn't very nice. The dust from harvest is horrible because the dust makes people get hay fever.
